title: In Memoriam
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Death: It comes for all of us, eventually. This week we bring you two tales from Reddit about the Grim Reaper himself. One involves gravestones; the other, a "natural" way to think about burial.
itunes:author: WBUR
itunes:title: In Memoriam
